title.value: Оценка эффективного плодородия почв Беларуси на энергетической основе
Assessing the effective of soil fertility of Belarus on the basis of energy

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Kalyuk, V.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was discussed the new approach to assessing the effective soil fertility of Belarus. This assessment is the basis for the calculation of internal humus energy in the 50-cm soil layer, with the introduction of correction factors for agrochemical cultivation by three indicators: the climatic conditions, the degree of moisture (depending on the granulometric composition of parent and underlying rock, structure of the soil profile) and stoniness. The fragment of the bank data for the calculation points of soil fertility on the energy basis, taking into account the correction factors for some varieties of sod-podzolic soils and cultural agricultural soils with various grain composition and degree of hydration is given in the article. Implementation of energy reserves of humus is possible in certain conditions of temperature, moisture, agro-ecological condition (agrochemical soil use, ameliorative condition, stoniness) soils. Therefore, to the evaluation points, calculated on the basis of above formula, there were added the correction factors or coefficients used in appraisal of cadastral valuation of land in Belarus.
